import React from "react"; import axios from "axios"; class Login extends React.Component { componentDidMount() { const form = document.getElementById("formpost"); const formData = new FormData(form); formData.append("title", "The frustration with post request"); form.onsubmit = () => axios.post("http://localhost:8001/api/login", formData).then(response => response.data); } render() { return (
E-COMMERCE
Accueil Connexion Inscription
{" "}

Se connecter

); } } export default Login;
